about_the_game:
The Making of The Painscreek Killings is a 206-page digital book for fans of the game. The purpose of this book is to provide a look into EQ Studios' journey in designing a detective walking simulator. The book includes an introduction, the history of EQ Studios, stages of game development, post launch period and life after the game's release.

This DLC is a digital PDF book, It is available only in English.

After Installation

After installation, The Making of The Painscreek Killings PDF file can be found in the folder "The Painscreek Killings" under the root folder where the game is installed.

To find the The Painscreek Killings folder, navigate to The Painscreek Killings in the Steam library, right click and select "Manage > Browse local files". A window will pop up where you can find "The Making of The Painscreek Killings - v1.0.pdf".


Includes:
[9 pages] Chapter 0: Introduction
[6 pages] Chapter 1: History
[106 pages] Chapter 2: Game Development
[30 pages] Chapter 3: Post Launch
[55 pages] Chapter 4: Wrapping Up
